title: Pics coming out white when the flash is used even when there is already a light source. Anyone else?
content:
Anytime I use the flash in the camera app, the pic comes out very washed out or just plain white. It doesn't matter if there is already a light source, it's white. The auto flash doesn't work at all,.even in a pitch black room.

If I use another app, like Snapchat, there are no problems.
